mapper.select:
select a.`id`,a.`username`,a.`nick_name`,a.`status`,b.`dept_name` as deptName,d.`role_name` as roleName,a.`create_by`,a.`create_time`,a.`update_by`,a.`update_time` from `sys_user` a inner join `t_dept` b on b.`id` = a.`dept_id` inner join `sys_user_role` c on c.`user_id` = a.`id` inner join `sys_role` d on d.`id` = c.`role_id` where a.`status` in (0,1)
and a.`username` like concat('%',#{q.username},'%')
and a.`nick_name` like concat('%',#{q.nickName},'%')
and a.`status` = #{q.status}
and a.`email` like concat('%',#{q.email},'%')
and a.`dept_id` = #{q.deptId}
order by a.`create_time` desc
